analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/14/0xacc2e73199c61c5b19b3e265b961a6cc808a2921.sol:
	Contract Currytoken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/14/0xacc2e73199c61c5b19b3e265b961a6cc808a2921.sol#188-189)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/14/0xacc2e73199c61c5b19b3e265b961a6cc808a2921.sol#57-58) is not in mixedCase
